v_project_id,

mapper.update:
update tbl_checking_task
v_project_id = #{vProjectId, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
v_village_id = #{vVillageId, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
v_principal_id = #{vPrincipalId, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
i_elevator_count = #{iElevatorCount, jdbcType=INTEGER},
i_status = #{iStatus, jdbcType=INTEGER},
d_check_date = #{dCheckDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
dt_create_time = #{dtCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
dt_modify_time = #{dtModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
v_create_user_id = #{vCreateUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
v_modify_user_id = #{vModifyUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
i_del_flag = #{iDelFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
v_address = #{vAddress, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
v_remark = #{vRemark, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
and v_checking_task_id = #{vCheckingTaskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and v_village_id = #{vVillageId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select count(1) as count, case when i_status = 1 then '未验收' when i_status = 2 then '验收中' when i_status = 3 then '完成' when i.i_status = 11 then '需调整' when i_status = -1 then '已取消' end as statusName from tbl_checking_task where i_del_flag = 0 group by statusName
